hint.scroll_down: scroll down to view my projects
hint.scroll_top: click to go back to top
hint.zoom: Click / Touch again to zoom out

projects.title: Captive Portal Templates
list: Collection of some of the Captive Portals I developed and maintained from my time with Intertouch.
projects.stack: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 4/5, jQuery and Handlebars

projects.title: Captive Portal Template Demo
list: Captive Portal Demo to demonstrate user flow of typical Captive Portal with focus on Access Codes.
Support multiple languages (based from Google Translate) and utilizes LocalSupport to simulate connected status even after browser reload

projects.title: Intertouch Passpoint Guest Account Portal Demo
list: Portal page I developed to showcase improved UX flow over existing Passpoint Guest Account Portal page with the goal of increasing user conversion rate

projects.title: Food Management App
list: Food app that allows user to order food, the kitchen is also able to receive the order and update status, also have the option to edit displayed menu.
Project I did for exploring React JS.
projects.stack: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 5.2, and React JS

projects.title: Untitle Life RPG
list: Live in the city, study, find a job and get at the top, hopefully.
It's a solo indie game project i'm doing whenever I have free time.
projects.stack: HTML5 Canvas, CSS3, Javascript Vanilla, and Pixel Art

projects.title: Web Resume
list: Instead of the normal Word or PDF resume format, I opted for a responsive web version because why not.

projects.title: This Portfolio
list: This portfolio. Presents my projects with a minimalist design approach.
Developed my own version of bootstrap carousel to display images, click to zoom, auto slides at set interval, click to slide and swipe to slide (for mobile devices).
projects.stack: HTML5, CSS3, Flexbox, jQuery, and Handlebars
